name: Brian Smith
what_you_do: I am a Grief Guide, Life Purpose Coach, and Small Business Consultant. My mission is to help people rediscover who they are and why they are here.
who_you_serve: I provide a safe space where you can safely share what you are experiencing and share techniques that I discovered and developed after my devastating loss.
social_proof: I am on the board of the SoulPhone Foundation and Helping Parents Heal. I am the author of "Grief 2 Growth: Planted. Not Buried." I am the host of the Grief 2 Growth podcast.
business_focus: To help people rediscover who they are and why they are here.
service_provided: grief counseling, life coaching, small business consulting
